name: SlingshotKnockout
description:
Slingshot Knockout!

A multiplayer game where you compete with friends to knock each other off platforms. There are a few minor bugs but most can be solved by restarting the game/server or resetting the round by having everyone alive jump off the platform. Our theme was gravity so we try to make the shots have weight and impacts knock you back. Best of luck and hope you enjoy!

Controls

WASD - To move

Space - To jump

Mouse1 - To charge / fire

That's it! Enjoy! Thanks!
